info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 22 at 3:39PM MDT until June 23 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...High temperatures from 105 to 109 degrees expected. * WHERE...Chaves County Plains including Roswell. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. Then, from noon to 8 PM MDT Friday and Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.
